title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
**Title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game - Ages 8 and Up**

**Unleash the Fun with Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents!**

Dive into a thrilling family showdown with the ultimate word guessing game, designed for players aged 8 and up. Get ready for non-stop laughter and strategy in the classic Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game!

**Key Features:**

- **2 Decks of Cards**: A total of 260 cards split evenly into a Kids deck and an Adult deck, each packed with over 1,000 words to guess and varied forbidden words to avoid.
- **Familiar vs. Varied Words**: Kids will be guessing familiar words, while adults tackle a more varied and challenging set, making each round exciting and unpredictable.
- **Fast-Paced Gameplay**: Enjoy quick, timed rounds with a one-minute timer included to keep the excitement at a fever pitch.
- **Innovative Game Elements**: The game includes a squeaker to ensure all your teammates are fully engaged, and a one-minute timer to add an extra layer of tension.
- **Winning Condition**: The team with the most points at the end of the game wins, making every guess count!
- **Perfect for Families**: Ideal for ages 8 and up, this game is perfect for family game nights, school events, and parties. The Kids vs. Parents theme adds a fun and engaging twist.

**Join the Battle of Wits!**

Whether you're a word master or a novice, Taboo Kids vs. Parents is a game that will challenge your vocabulary and strategic thinking. It’s not just a game; it’s a family tradition waiting to be started. So gather your team, pick your deck, and let the guessing begin!

**Available Now from Your Favorite Retailer!**
